field.default: Raising a Response Time SLA Alert. Alert details are as follows:- SLA Name: ${sla.name}. Requirement: At least ${sla.threshold}% of requests should have response times less than ${sla.upper} millis. Failing Percentage: ${sla.value}%. Failing Time: ${sla.time}.
field.name: breachAlertMessage

field.default: Clearing a Response Time SLA Alert. Alert details are as follows:- SLA Name: ${sla.name}. Requirement: At least ${sla.threshold}% of requests should have response times less than ${sla.upper} millis. Current Percentage: ${sla.value}%. Current Time: ${sla.time}.
field.name: clearAlertMessage

field.default: Raising a HTTP Status Code SLA Alert. Alert details are as follows:- SLA Name: ${sla.name}. Requirement: ${sla.threshold.type.str} ${sla.threshold}% of requests should have HTTP status codes in range [${sla.lower} - ${sla.upper}]. Current Percentage: ${sla.value}%. Current Time: ${sla.time}.
field.name: breachAlertMessage

field.default: Clearing a HTTP Status Code SLA Alert. Alert details are as follows:- SLA Name: ${sla.name}. Requirement: ${sla.threshold.type.str} ${sla.threshold}% of requests should have HTTP status codes in range [${sla.lower} - ${sla.upper}]. Current Percentage: ${sla.value}%. Clearance Time: ${sla.time}.
field.name: clearAlertMessage

field.default: Raising a Comms Failure SLA Alert. Alert details are as follows:- SLA Name: ${sla.name}. Requirement: No more than ${sla.threshold}% of requests may result in a comms failure. Percentage: ${sla.value}%. Time: ${sla.time}.
field.name: breachAlertMessage

field.default: Clearing a Comms Failure SLA Alert. Alert details are as follows:- SLA Name: ${sla.name}. Requirement: No more than ${sla.threshold}% of requests may result in a comms failure. Current Percentage: ${sla.value}%. Clearance Time: ${sla.time}.
field.name: clearAlertMessage
